entry.title: Issue connecting custom form to MES | "Form is a legacy form and cannot be used with this API"
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m currently working with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, and we’re facing an issue when trying to connect a form (in this case, a custom one, but we also tested with standard forms) to a custom plant control system (MES system).

When triggering the process, we get the following error message:

“Form: YY1_PP_ETIQUETAFABRICACION is a legacy form and cannot be used with this API.”

see attached screenshot for details:

Stardard FormCustom Form

 

 

 

 

We would like to understand:

  • Are we possibly using the wrong API for this scenario?

  • Is there a way to adapt or convert the form type so that it can be used?

  • Is this limitation expected for forms of this kind in Public Cloud?

Any insights, documentation links, or experiences with similar cases would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your help!

Best regards,

ASG.

#S4HANACloud #SAPPublicCloud #SAPForms #ABAPCloud #SAPIntegration #SAPAPI #MESIntegration #SAPBTP #BusinessTechnologyPlatform #FormsService #S4HANA #SAPCommunity

entry.title: S/4HANA Cloud CBO logic: Read BP Attachment, Base64, and store as 500-char chunks?
entry.content:
System: SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition and Private Edition
Extensibility: Key-User Custom Business Object (CBO) 

Preparation step: A PDF is attached to the Business Partner with filename

Desired behavior (in CBO logic)

  1. Read the BP attachment

  2. Encode binary to Base64.

  3. Split into 500-character parts.

  4. Save those parts into CBO(multiple rows/items).

Questions for the community

  1. Is there a released (whitelisted) API that CBO key-user logic can call to read a Business Partner attachment by filename or attachment ID?

  2. Are HTTP/OData calls allowed from CBO logic for this purpose?
  3. If direct read from CBO logic is not supported, what is the recommended pattern?

my call fails before the HTTP request is sent (BLE circuit-breaker “fail-fast”).
Call is from CBO logic using CL_BLE_HTTP_CLIENT.

DATA: lv_comm_scenario type string,
            lv_outbound_service type string,
            lv_csrf type string,
           lv_body type string,
           lv_content_length type string.

DATA: lv_filename TYPE string VALUE 'lv_upload_id.pdf'.
lv_comm_scenario = 'YY1_CCS_SMI_INTERNAL'.
lv_outbound_service = 'YY1_OUTB_ADD_ATTACHMENT_REST'.
DATA(lo_client) = cl_ble_http_client=>create( communication_scenario = lv_comm_scenario outbound_service = lv_outbound_service ).
DATA(lo_req1) = cl_ble_http_request=>create( ). lo_req1->set_method( if_ble_http_request=>co_method-get ).
DATA(lv_filter) = |$filter=BusinessObjectTypeName eq 'BUSINESSPARTNER' and LinkedSAPObjectKey eq '9980000154'|.
lo_req1->set_resource_extension( |/AttachmentFolder?{ lv_filter }&$expand=to_Doc&$top=1| ).
TRY.
DATA(lo_res1) = lo_client->send( lo_req1->set_header_parameter( name = 'Accept' value = 'application/json' ) ).
CATCH cx_ble_http_exception INTO DATA(lx).
"-> log/raise lx->get_text( ) "config or DNS/SSL problems show up here RETURN. ENDTRY.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Parameter has invalid value: Parameter IV_VALUE has invalid value .
entry.content:
Hi All,

Below is my oData URL and when executing from /IWFND/GW_CLIENT

/sap/opu/odata4/sap/api_project_v3/srvd_a2x/sap/project/0001/WBSElement?sap-statistics=true&$top=2

I am getting the below response:
{
"error" : {
"code" : "CX_PARAMETER_INVALID_RANGE",
"message" : "Parameter has invalid value: Parameter IV_VALUE has invalid value .",
"@SAP__common.ExceptionCategory" : "Client_Error",
"details" : [
{
"code" : "/IWCOR/CX_OD_INTERNAL_ERROR/0050569259751EE4BA97133877F61116",
"message" : "In the context of Data Services an unknown internal server error occurred",
"@SAP__common.Severity" : "error",
"@SAP__common.numericSeverity" : 4
},
{
"code" : "/IWCOR/CX_OD_EP_ENTITY_ERROR/0050569259751EE4BA9739C53C899155",
"message" : "Error occurred while processing property 'SchedldBasicEarliestStartDate' of entity with index 1",
"@SAP__common.Severity" : "error",
"@SAP__common.numericSeverity" : 4
},
{
"code" : "/IWCOR/CX_OD_EP_PROPERTY_ERROR/005056A509B11ED1BF822D2D09173A04",
"message" : "Property 'SchedldBasicEarliestStartDate' has invalid value ''",
"@SAP__common.Severity" : "error",
"@SAP__common.numericSeverity" : 4
}
],
"innererror" : {
"ErrorDetails" : {
"@SAP__common.Application" : {
"ComponentId" : "PS-ST",
"ServiceRepository" : "SRVD_A2X",
"ServiceId" : "API_PROJECT_V3",
"ServiceVersion" : "0001"
},
"@SAP__common.TransactionId" : "A2E9BF5D760A0070E0068F0DD38A7ACB",
"@SAP__common.Timestamp" : "20251016161510.514754",
"@SAP__common.ErrorResolution" : {
"Analysis" : "Use ADT feed reader \"SAP Gateway Error Log\" or run transaction /IWFND/ERROR_LOG on SAP Gateway hub system and search for entries with the timestamp above for more details",
"Note" : "See SAP Note 1797736 for error analysis (https://service.sap.com/sap/support/notes/1797736)"
}
}
}
}
}

Did anyone faced this error and please let me know how to resolve this error?

Thanks,

BK

entry.title: 403 Forbidden Error in BTP ABAP Trial Environment — Request Blocked by UCON
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

From the last 4-5 days i am facing the below issue: 

I  have connected BTP Trial account to Eclipse ADT. I don't have access to SAP GUI. While previewing the service url I am getting this error. I am frustrated from the last 4 days. Stuck to only this. can you please give me an appropriate solution. I have deleted the BTP trial account and generated a new instance still not resolved, even I have created a new workspace in Eclipse that also doesn't solve the issue. Previously I used to see the preview of the app and service url. I have attached the error screenshot below. Note: My BTP Trial account is still active. I'm using BAS and it's working perfectly.

entry.title: Issue with CBO App UI Not Visible After Moving to QA
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have created a Custom Business Object (CBO) and assigned a business catalog SAP_FIN_BC_SA_PER_PC  to it. In the development system, the app name was visible and working fine. However, after transporting it to the QA system, the “Generate UI” option is showing as disabled, and the app name is not visible.

All the related artifacts for the CBO have been moved to QA, and I have also tried re-importing the collection , but the issue still persists.

Could you please suggest what might be causing this issue or what steps I can take to resolve it?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Displaying Serial numbers in custom cds views Report
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I’m currently working on a custom CDS view/report in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and would like to display serial numbers (for materials) in the output. Could anyone please guide me on the best approach to achieve this? Specifically, I’m looking for:

  1. How to include serial numbers in custom CDS views (built in Eclipse ADT).
  2. Whether it’s possible to fetch and display them directly through released data sources or associations.
  3. Any alternative methods (e.g., using standard I_* views, extensibility options, or Fiori analytical queries) to display serial numbers in reports.

entry.title: Interactive report screen refresh issue cl_gui_alv_grid method used
entry.content:
Hi Gurus,

  I have created interactive report with 2 screens 9000 and 9001. When the user click on the line on the 9000 screen , the 9001 screen will give the drill down of that particular record. This is working fine only for the first time. When I go back to 9000 and clicked on the other record, it is not showing the drill down of the newly clicked record, but showing the previous one. Basically the screen is not getting refreshed. 

LASS lcl_event_handler IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD handle_double_click.
    IF r_grid_9001 IS NOT INITIAL AND r_container IS NOT INITIAL.
*      CALL METHOD r_grid_9001->free.
*      CALL METHOD r_container_9001->free.
    ENDIF.
    IF rb2 = 'X'.
      DATA: lv_row_index TYPE lvc_index,
            lv_column_id TYPE lvc_fname.

      lv_row_index = e_row-index.
      lv_column_id = e_column-fieldname.

      READ TABLE lt_final INTO DATA(ls_final) INDEX lv_row_index.
      CLEAR gv_rfha.
      gv_rfha = ls_final-rfha.
*    call TRANSACTION zcml_multilat using

      CALL SCREEN 9001.
      EXIT.
    ENDIF.

PROCESS BEFORE OUTPUT.
  MODULE status_9001.
  MODULE fetchdata.
  MODULE processdata.
  MODULE buildfcat.
  MODULE display.
*
PROCESS AFTER INPUT.
  MODULE user_command_9001.

MODULE display OUTPUT.
* SET PF-STATUS 'xxxxxxxx'.
* SET TITLEBAR 'xxx'.
  CLEAR gs_layo.
  gs_layo-cwidth_opt = 'X'.
*  FREE r_container_9001.
*  FREE r_grid_9001.  "added by pasha 29/10/25

  IF r_container_9001 IS INITIAL.
    CREATE OBJECT r_container_9001
      EXPORTING
        container_name = 'CUST_NEW'.

    CREATE OBJECT r_grid_9001
      EXPORTING
        i_parent = r_container_9001.
****added by pasha****
    DATA lt_dummy TYPE TABLE OF ty_final.
    lt_dummy[] = lt_final_9001[].
*CALL METHOD r_grid_9001->set_table_for_first_display
*  CHANGING it_outtab = lt_dummy it_fieldcatalog = gt_fcat.
****** eoc *************
*    CREATE OBJECT lo_event_handler.
*    SET HANDLER r_grid->handle_double_click FOR lo_alv_grid.

*    CALL METHOD r_grid->refresh_table_display.
    r_grid_9001->check_changed_data( ).
*    CALL METHOD r_grid_9001->free.
*    CALL METHOD r_container_9001->free.
    CALL METHOD r_grid_9001->set_table_for_first_display
      EXPORTING
*       i_buffer_active               =
*       i_bypassing_buffer            =
*       i_consistency_check           =
*       i_structure_name              =
*       is_variant                    =
*       i_save                        =
*       i_default                     = 'X'
        is_layout                     = gs_layo
*       is_print                      =
*       it_special_groups             =
*       it_toolbar_excluding          = lt_exclude
*       it_hyperlink                  =
*       it_alv_graphics               =
*       it_except_qinfo               =
*       ir_salv_adapter               =
      CHANGING
*       it_outtab                     = lt_final_9001
        it_outtab                     = lt_dummy
        it_fieldcatalog               = gt_fcat
*       it_sort                       =
*       it_filter                     =
      EXCEPTIONS
        invalid_parameter_combination = 1
        program_error                 = 2
        too_many_lines                = 3
        OTHERS                        = 4.

    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
    ENDIF.
  ELSE.
    CALL METHOD r_grid->refresh_table_display.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
*   Implement suitable error handling here
    ENDIF.
  ENDIF.
  CREATE OBJECT r_event_9001.
  SET HANDLER r_event_9001->handle_double_click FOR r_grid_9001.

*  DATA : r_event TYPE REF TO lcl_event_handler.
*  CREATE OBJECT r_event.
*  SET HANDLER r_event->handle_double_click FOR r_grid.
*  CLEAR lt_final_9001.  "ADDED 29/10/25
  cl_gui_cfw=>flush( )."ADDED 29/10/25
  rb2 = 'X'.
  REFRESH :  lt_vtbfhapo[], lt_vdarl[], lt_zvdbevi[].
ENDMODULE.

In debugging I can see the correct values are getting into the internal table lt_final_9001 but when it is getting displayed on the screen, it is only displaying the drill down of the one which is clicked for the first time. 
Everything looks perfect in debugging but on screen display the data is not showing correctly. Kindly please help .

entry.title: Need to Display Uploaded Image from Custom Table in ABAP Report Output
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have two requirements related to handling images in SAP ABAP :

  1. In a custom screen, users should be able to upload an image, and that image needs to be saved in a custom table. I plan to achieve this by converting the image into an XSTRING (raw string) and storing it in the custom table.

  2. In a custom report, I need to fetch the records from this custom table and convert the XSTRING data back into a viewable image file. In the report output, there should be a file icon field, and when the user clicks on it, the corresponding image should open or display.

My question is:
Is it possible to convert the stored XSTRING value back into an image file and open it directly from the report? If yes, could you please explain how to achieve this or share any sample code?

Thanks in advance,
Kiran

entry.title: Table line items not displaying in duplicated form copy (Adobe Form)
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m working on an Adobe Form where my client requires a duplicate copy of the form within the same PDF.

I have duplicated the entire form object, and both the original and duplicate forms are bound to the same XML data source.

Here’s the issue:

  • The field values (scripted fields) are displaying correctly in PDF preview.

  • However, the table line items are displayed only in the original form and not in the duplicate form copy.

  • The duplicate form is bound to the same XML nodes, but the table data is not replicating dynamically. even though I have tried using scripting logic to force data refresh and rebind events.

Has anyone else faced this kind of issue before?
Would appreciate any suggestions or solutions to make the table data appear dynamically in both copies during preview or print.

Thanks in advance!
— Merushetha Kannan
SAP Forms service by Adobe SAP Interactive Forms by Adobe SAP BTP ABAP environment @XFA @adobe @SAPExpert JavaScript SAP S/4HANA Cloud ABAP Environment

entry.title: Mismatch in Table Display – Incorrect Values for Packing and Forwarding in Adobe Form
entry.content:
Dear SAP Experts,

The XML data provided by the functional consultant has been verified and is mapped correctly as per the SAP data in the Adobe LiveCycle designer. As per the XML:

  • Packing (ZK10) value = 125
  • Forwarding (ZK03) value = 23,000

However, when the Purchase Order (MM-PO) form is previewed in Adobe LiveCycle Designer, the table displays incorrect values:

  • Packing (ZK10) is showing as 240
  • Forwarding (ZK03) is showing as 47,50,22,365

The XML mapping and data structure appear to be correct, but the data displayed in the table(form- design Adobe LiveCycle designer) is not aligning properly with the source values. This indicates that the issue is likely related to data binding or layout rendering within the LiveCycle form.

The exact root cause is not yet identified. Could you please check and advise on the possible solution for this mismatch issue?

I have attached the screenshots for your reference

 FORM TABLE-ADOBE LIVECYCLE DESIGNER

XML DATA SOURCE:

Thanks for your support in Advance!
SAP Interactive Forms by Adobe SAP Forms service by Adobe JavaScript @SAP @SAPABAP

entry.title: ZLOCAL is not a valid software component for package Zxx_TUTORIALS in Eclipse ADT 2022-09
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am using Eclipse 2022-09 with ABAP Development Tools (ADT), and I am having trouble creating a new Z-package.

Issue 1: ZLOCAL is not accepted (TR458)

When I select the software component ZLOCAL, I get:


ZLOCAL is not a valid software component for package ZXX_TUTORIALS (TR458)

It also required choosing a transport layer, which I believe should not happen for a LOCAL component.

Issue 2: HOME also asks for a Transport Layer

If I select HOME, the system again requests a transport layer.
After choosing a layer, I get this error:

 
System setting does not allow you to change R3TR DEVC Zxx_TUTORIALS
Message No. TR006

Diagnosis says:

  • HOME is not modifiable in this SAP system

  • Modifiability must be changed in Transport Organiser Tools → System Change Options

  • System Details

    • Eclipse 2022-09

    • Latest ADT

    • SAP backend: S/4HANA (on-premise)

      Any help or direction will be appreciated.
      Thank you!

entry.title: How to Calculate VAT for PO and get in the Standard form(MM_PUR_PURCHASE_ORDER)
entry.content: Hello experts, I’m using the PO form template MM_PUR_PURCHASE_ORDER. I need to calculate VAT at line item level, sum it up, and show the final amount including VAT in the PO PDF. I understand VAT fields exist in PO item conditions, but they are not exposed in the delivered template. Could you guide me on how to expose these fields via CDS/OData and bind them in the form template, including the calculation logic for summation? Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Custom Number Range for Process Order
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts
We have a requirement to set up custom number ranges for Process Orders based on their order types.

For example

  • Order Type PO1 should start from 500000

  • Order Type PO2 should start from 900000

How can this be configured in SAP S4HANA Public Cloud
Kindly assist

entry.title: In public cloud how to get Sales Order Header Text
entry.content:
How can we read Sales Order Header Text in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (clean core, no modification)?

I have tried multiple ways but couldn’t get the header text of a Sales Order.
In Public Cloud:

  • Read_Text is not allowed

  • Table access to STXH/STXL is not allowed

  • CDS view extensibility for reading text via text-object/text-id is not available

  • BAdI access to SD text API is restricted

  • The only relevant released view is I_SALESORDERTP , but this cannot be used inside our custom CDS view.

Current system: S4 2023 

Thank you !

entry.title: CX_SADL_DUMP_APPL_MODEL_ERROR while sending GET Request to ODATA v4 with /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I am trying to create ODATA V4 as mentioned in SAP Note 2485370, So I created a custom entity in Eclipse and also a Class with below method implemented from interface /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC. 

@EndUserText.label: 'ZSAMPLE_SERVICE'
@ObjectModel.query.implementedBy: 'ABAP:ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE'
define custom entity ZSAMPLE_SERVICE
{
   key component_material : abap.char(40);
       fg_material  : abap.char(40);
       fg_material_descr : abap.char(40);
  
}

And Class as below

CLASS ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE DEFINITION
  PUBLIC
  inheriting from /iwbep/cx_gateway
  FINAL
  CREATE PUBLIC .

  PUBLIC SECTION.

    INTERFACES /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC.
  PROTECTED SECTION.
  PRIVATE SECTION.
ENDCLASS.



CLASS ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~CREATE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~CREATE_REFERENCE.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~DELETE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~EXECUTE_ACTION.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~EXECUTE_FUNCTION.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_ENTITY.

    DATA: TS_DATA TYPE zsample_service.
    TS_DATA-COMPONENT_MATERIAL = '12333333'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL = '321'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL_DESCR = 'This is material description'.


    IO_RESPONSE->SET_BUSI_DATA( TS_DATA ).
  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_ENTITY_LIST.
    DATA: TS_DATA TYPE zsample_service,
          TT_DATA TYPE TABLE OF zsample_service.
    TS_DATA-COMPONENT_MATERIAL = '12333333'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL = '321'.
    TS_DATA-FG_MATERIAL_DESCR = 'This is material description'.
    APPEND TS_DATA TO TT_DATA.
    IO_RESPONSE->SET_BUSI_DATA( TT_DATA[] ).
  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_REF_TARGET_KEY_DATA.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~READ_REF_TARGET_KEY_DATA_LIST.

  ENDMETHOD.

  METHOD /IWBEP/IF_V4_DP_BASIC~UPDATE_ENTITY.

  ENDMETHOD.

ENDCLASS.

After this, I created service definition to explose above cds entity and then service binding.

When I do Get request to my service URL from postman I am  getting dump saying as below

Error analysis                                                                                    |
|    The application has indicated exception "CX_SADL_DUMP_APPL_MODEL_ERROR" as the                |
|     reason for the                                                                               |
|    termination:                                                                                  |
|    Processing was aborted because of an application modeling error: See previous                 |
|    in exception chain.                                                                           |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception                                            |
|     "LCX_RAP_QUERY_PROV_BAD_IMPLMNT" that occurred in                                            |
|    program "CL_SADL_UNMANAGED_QUERY_ENGINECP", in line 6 of include                              |
|     "CL_SADL_UNMANAGED_QUERY_ENGINECM00J". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Error occurred during execution of query provider 'ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE'                        |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception                                            |
|     "CX_RAP_QUERY_PROV_CONSTRUCTION" that occurred in                                            |
|    program "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CP", in line 6 of include                              |
|     "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CM004". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Error during construction of the Unmanaged Query Provider for entity                          |
|    ZSAMPLE_SERVICE                                                                               |
|                                                                                                  |
|    The exception is related to the previous exception "CX_SY_CREATE_OBJECT_ERROR"                |
|     that occurred in                                                                             |
|    program "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CP", in line 3 of include                              |
|     "CL_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER_FACTORY=CM004". The reason for this exception                         |
|    was:                                                                                          |
|    Could not create object; reference variable does not match specified class                    |
|    ZCL_SAMPLE_SERVICE.

Can anyone help on this?

I appreciate your time and reply on this query.

Regards,

Omkar
